reviewText: This DVD (and also the book which it once accompanied--IF you can find it) provides just about the best help with converting a household to use safer items for cleaning and ridding one's home environment of toxic commercial cleansers and cleaning chemicals.  Everything is demonstrated, the recipes given, and they work.  They ALL work.  Whereas, out on the internet, you'll find lots of options and you won't know which ones will work and which won't.  It's easier just to get the DVD, view it, write down the recipes, and you're ready to go.
